overview:
Thomas founded PlanMill in 2001 after 16 years of professional experience in the IT, chemical and plastic sectors. His focus has always been on developing the right relationship with the customer and building the right team to accelerate PlanMill’s presence in the marketplace. These commitments established a solid foundation for the company.

Prior to PlanMill, Thomas spent ten years leading and managing high-growth sales and consulting organizations such as CA, Enfo (former Disnet), ICI and Westend ICT (former TJ Group) in the information technology services and plastic industries.

Thomas is consistently recognized as one of the ‘Top 100 Influential IT Persons in Finland’.
